about_the_game:
You are a cat, a magic cat! You have to deal with the mouse king, who stole a whole country of cats with a giant flying vacuum cleaner. On your way you will meet a mushroom boss who terraces a village sitting in a dark forest, a giant spider capturing a castle, a gorilla boss who makes chaos on a tropical island and much more.
Travel to various locations and fight with a large number of enemies, fly on an airplane or a submarine.
This game is about bossfights, run and gun, runners and it is suitable for really hardcore players who are ready to sell their soul to the devil for the sake of victory.
detailed_description:
You are a cat, a magic cat! You have to deal with the mouse king, who stole a whole country of cats with a giant flying vacuum cleaner. On your way you will meet a mushroom boss who terraces a village sitting in a dark forest, a giant spider capturing a castle, a gorilla boss who makes chaos on a tropical island and much more.
Travel to various locations and fight with a large number of enemies, fly on an airplane or a submarine.
This game is about bossfights, run and gun, runners and it is suitable for really hardcore players who are ready to sell their soul to the devil for the sake of victory.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11.6
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-650, 1.8 GHz or AMD Phenom II 965, 2.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.11.6
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-650, 1.8 GHz or AMD Phenom II 965, 2.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (3 GB Memory or higher) or AMD Radeon HD 7970 (3 GB Memory or higher)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: Wonder Cat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64 bit: Vista, Win 7, Win 8, Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-650, 1.8 GHz or AMD Phenom II 965, 2.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64 bit: Vista, Win 7, Win 8, Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-650, 1.8 GHz or AMD Phenom II 965, 2.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (3 GB Memory or higher) or AMD Radeon HD 7970 (3 GB Memory or higher)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any

short_description: BossFights, Run & Gun, Runner, non-linear walkthrough, airplanes, bathyscaphes and magic creatures.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
